property.name: pdfFileName
property.description-key: Name of the generated PDF file (without extension)

property.name: pdfExportTitle
property.description-key: Title rendered in the PDF header

property.name: pdfExportSubtitle
property.description-key: Subtitle rendered below the title

property.name: logoBase64
property.description-key: Base64 encoded logo image. If empty, uses the default logo from logo.ts

property.name: landscapeOrientation
property.description-key: If true, PDF will be in landscape orientation; if false, portrait orientation

property.name: linkTextColumn
property.description-key: Column name whose text will be displayed as a clickable link (optional)

property.name: linkUrlColumn
property.description-key: Column name containing URLs for the link text column (optional, not printed)

property.name: apiUrl
property.description-key: JSON array with row data objects (column name and values)

property.name: columnConfig
property.description-key: JSON array with column configuration (NombreColumna, TipoColumna, PropiedadesColumna, Print)

property.name: columnGroups
property.description-key: JSON array with grouped columns structure (headerName, children)

property.name: headerFill
property.description-key: Background color for table headers (hex format)

property.name: headerColor
property.description-key: Text color for table headers (hex format)

property.name: fontSize
property.description-key: Font size for table content in points

property.name: fill
property.description-key: Background color of the button (hex format)

property.name: color
property.description-key: Text color of the button (hex format)

property.name: borderColor
property.description-key: Border color of the button (hex format)

property.name: borderRadius
property.description-key: Border radius of the button in pixels

property.name: buttonFontSize
property.description-key: Font size of the button text in pixels

property.name: buttonFontWeight
property.description-key: Font weight of the button text (100-900)

property.name: borderThickness
property.description-key: Border thickness in pixels

property.name: hoverFill
property.description-key: Background color when hovering (hex format)

property.name: hoverColor
property.description-key: Text color when hovering (hex format)

property.name: hoverBorderColor
property.description-key: Border color when hovering (hex format)

property.name: pressedFill
property.description-key: Background color when pressed (hex format)

property.name: pressedColor
property.description-key: Text color when pressed (hex format)

property.name: pressedBorderColor
property.description-key: Border color when pressed (hex format)
